com.soen6441.core.map.validator

Class ConnectionValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen6441.core.map.PathValidator
      • com.soen6441.core.map.validator.ConnectionValidator

  • public class ConnectionValidator
extends PathValidator
    The class ConnectedPathValidator is a subclass of PathValidator. It overrides the method Validate() of its parent class and checks whether there is a connected path between startPoint and EndPoint.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Mohammad Ali

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        This method Validate() overrides the method Validate() of parent class PathValidator. It checks whether a path exist between startPoint and EndPoint.
        Specified by:
        validate in class PathValidator
        Returns:
        boolean A boolean values that represent whether a Path exist between startPoint and EndPoint.
